overview.title: What this blend is
overview.text: The most widely used repair pairing in the peptide space. BPC-157 and TB-500 are frequently co-prescribed because they address tissue repair at complementary steps — one locally angiogenic, one systemically remodeling. This combination covers both the acute vascular response and the longer-term structural rebuilding in a single protocol.

use_cases.title: Use cases (real-world)
use_cases.text: Use cases are framed as intent + context, not as a recommendation.
People usually consider blends when they’re trying to simplify decision-making, stack fewer vials, or chase a combined effect profile. The downside is more moving parts and more uncertainty.
If one component would be a bad fit for you (meds, history, side effects), the blend is also a bad fit — even if the other component seems appealing.

interaction_summary.title: Interaction summary
interaction_summary.text: Interaction flags are category prompts — not dosing instructions.
Blends inherit interaction risk from every component. If one component has a meaningful interaction class, treat the blend as having that interaction class.
If you’re on prescription meds (especially cardio, anticoagulant/antiplatelet, serotonergic, immunomodulating), treat uncertainty as a reason to slow down and verify with a clinician.

blend.rationale: The most widely used repair pairing in the peptide space. BPC-157 and TB-500 are frequently co-prescribed because they address tissue repair at complementary steps — one locally angiogenic, one systemically remodeling. This combination covers both the acute vascular response and the longer-term structural rebuilding in a single protocol.
blend.synergy_note: BPC-157 drives blood vessel formation and localized repair — it's most effective close to the injection site. TB-500 distributes systemically and handles the broader tissue migration and remodeling phase. Together they cover both the initiation and consolidation stages of healing.
blend.who_its_for: The baseline repair stack. General soft tissue injury recovery, athletes, post-surgical healing, anyone who wants the core BPC-157 mechanism plus systemic tissue repair coverage.

component_roles.bpc-157: Localized angiogenesis and repair — most effective near the injection site, strong GI protective effect
component_roles.tb-500: Systemic remodeling — distributes throughout the body and drives tissue matrix repair across multiple sites
